page.title: 03My Day.
page.content: In the morning I wake up at 7a.m.I go downstairs for my breakfast.I have Start which is my favourite cereal.We have it with milk and sugar.I wash and put on my grey school uniform.I have to wait a little while until I hear a bang at the door.That is my friends calling me.Our mums chat together.We walk down the lane to the bus stop we have to wait for ages for the bus.It comes from Wheddon Cross and picks up all the children from Wootton Courtney Tivington and Luccombe and takes them to Timberscombe School starts at 8.55a.m.with Assembly.At 3.10p.m the bus takes me home. Mummy meets me and we go home for tea. We have sausages chips and beans.One night a week I go to Boys' Brigade at the Baptist church in Minehead and another to cubs in Alcombe.I like to watch T.V.before going to bed at 8.00p.m.
